subject: Re: Another melt down?
author: purplespacefriend
full_text:
It would be interesting if you could record some of those, maybe post them on the group?

F-S

--- In EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.com, nena.razmara@... wrote:
>
> If we are not supposed to have access then why don't they just push block and delete? Sometimes. I think they are all insane on the otherside. Frankly I am a bit disappointed that heaven has a ring tone and they sing the word "heaven" over and over again. I can't say that I am looking forward to whatever lies beyond this mess.
> Sent via BlackBerry from T-Mobile
>
